pr_title: Add spotbug checks for pulsar-client-api module

timeline.bodyText:
IMO it is better to add a suppresswarnings here and do not clone the array.
Even if we are not in an hot path
timeline.author: eolivelli

replies.bodyText: OK, I'll ignore the setter/getter of the array.
replies.author: BewareMyPower
